product_name: Aqua Sphere Vista Jr. Swim Goggles - Kids'
long_description: The Aqua Sphere Vista Jr. swim goggles offer advanced performance and comfort with a contoured, low-profile frame that reduces drag. Soft, leak-resistant skirt along with Quick-Fit(TM) 1-touch buckle system make these goggles comfortable and hassle-free. Durable Plexisol(R) polycarbonate lenses offer 100% UVA and UVB protection along with antifog and scratch-resistant coatings. Aqua Sphere Vista Jr. swim goggles feature clear, 180deg lenses that provide distortion-free visibility for swimming indoors or in low light.
short_description: The Aqua Sphere Vista Jr. swim goggles offer advanced performance and comfort with a contoured, low-profile frame that reduces drag.
